name: Project Banana Boat
description: This is my first ever submission on itch.io! Project Banana Boat is a 2d side scrolling shooter written in Java from scratch by Jacob McHugh using lwjgl and slick util. All artwork was done by Christopher Rogers. Sound effects were created by zapsplat.com. Ingame music was created by Jacob McHugh. There is a work in progress mod support feature for building custom side scrolling shooters. Please play and enjoy!
